586A744062E94A9A.title: Follow the path of the Farmer [Click]

description: Many resources are &&3renewable&&r, meaning they can be &&dacquired endlessly&&r without moving around.
That means &&3farms&&r! but not just for crops - for &&dbuilding materials, special food, and more&&r!
Farms that involve &&3killing mobs&&r are not covered here. Most farms can be &&dautomated with machines&&r - but this isn't required!
Don't just gather the quest materials - &&dmake the farms&&r! and don't be afraid to make them look cool.
